title: How to Make Burger Bites

steps.headline: Defrost.
steps.description: Take burger patty out of freezer 5 hours before cooking and place in fridge, or defrost burger patty in microwave shortly before cooking.

steps.headline: Prep bread.
steps.description: Get both slices of bread and butter both sides. Toast (Or fry as some people call it) bread until golden brown, like a grilled cheese but bread is separate without cheese.

steps.headline: Prep sauce.
steps.description: Mix ketchup and hot sauce. Warm in microwave for 15 seconds, or leave cold.

steps.headline: Cook the meat.
steps.description: When burger patty is thawed, cut into cubes and cook until fully cooked. (Should not be raw)

steps.headline: Finish the meat.
steps.description: Take 1 teaspoon of the ketchup sauce and lightly brush over cubed burger and toss after its cooked.

steps.headline: Finish the bread.
steps.description: Cut toasted / fried bread into squares.

steps.headline: Finish the meal.
steps.description: Toss bread and burger cubes together until combined. Evenly sprinkle shredded or cubed cheese on bread and burger mixture and toss until evenly distributed. Put in microwave for 10–45 seconds or until melted. Serve burger bites on plate or in bowl with remaining ketchup sauce on the side. Garnish with chives, if using. Include other burger condiments such as mustard, or mayo, if desired, on the plate beside ketchup sauce. If using things like lettuce or tomato, etc., sprinkle on top just before serving.
